name: Simple Aweber Integration
author: Michael Schurpf

sections.description:
Simple Aweber Integration – Key Features

  • Automatically attach Aweber forms to WordPress pages or posts and choose whether at the beginning or end.
  • Choose a custom styling of your Aweber form: Original vertical Aweber form or a horizontal Aweber form.
  • Blend out certain Aweber form parts like header or footer.
  • Shortcode support for simple Aweber form integration into individual posts or pages.
  • Priority option to easily determine Aweber form display order.

Docs & Support

Find more information at http://www.schurpf.com/simple-aweber-integration/ and a dedicated help page over at http://www.schurpf.com/simple-aweber-integration-help/.

Notes

The plugin was downloaded 490 times while I hosted it on my site.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire ‘simple-aweber-integration’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find the settings under Settings -> Simple Aweber Integration in your WordPress admin panel.

For basic usage, you can also have a look at the http://www.schurpf.com/simple-aweber-integration/. To find help, pls read http://www.schurpf.com/simple-aweber-integration-help/.
sections.faq: None so far. I answered a few questions over http://www.schurpf.com/simple-aweber-integration#comments.

short_description: Simply add Aweber forms to all posts/pages at bottom or top. Alternatively use a shortcode to add forms to your content.
